Key Match Events: Bronny James led the Lakers with a game-high three blocks
Max Christie posted 11 points, seven rebounds, two assists, one steal and two blocks in a game-high 34 minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Redick is already angling to deploy Christie as one of the team's primary stoppers
Redick had high praise for Christie saying he's an old soul, wise and mature and takes the game very seriously
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers finished the game 10-of-32 from deep (31.3 percent)
The Lakers have ranked in the bottom 10 in 3-point attempts in four of five seasons with James and Davis
Others: The Lakers' offense will look much different on Sunday if James and/or Davis plays against the Phoenix Suns
Bronny remains raw offensively and his handle isn't good enough to take the ball full-court against NBA-level pressure
